name: hm03
effect: Teaches Surf to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Surf to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Creates a huge
wave, then crashes
it down on the foe.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Creates a huge
wave, then crashes
it down on the foe.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A big wave crashes
down on the foe.
Can also be used
for crossing water.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
It swamps the entire battlefield with
a giant wave. It can also be used
to cross water.

It swamps the entire battlefield with
a giant wave. It can also be used
to cross water.

a giant wave. It can also be used

flavor_text_entries.black-white:

with a giant wave.
It can also be used for crossing water.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:

This can also be used for crossing water.
